revised_title: In-depth Analysis of Hovering Insect Flight Kinematics
tldr: This study investigates the kinematics of hovering insect flight using high-speed cinematography to observe insects in free flight. The research focuses on the motion of wings and bodies, providing insights into flight behavior and maneuverability. The authors describe a projection analysis technique that can be applied to various types of flight, enabling a better understanding of the control mechanisms involved in insect flight.
